price: Hakika binaadamu bila ya shaka yumo katika khasara,
footnotes: Hakika kila binaadamu bila ya shaka yumo katika namna fulani au fulani ya kukhasiri, kwa mujibu wa anavyo ghilibiwa na pumbao na matamanio.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
